00030 from Koo.Fields.TranslationDialog import *
00031 from Koo.Fields.AbstractFieldWidget import *
00032 from PyQt4.QtCore import *
00033 from PyQt4.QtGui import *
00034 
00035 class TextBoxFieldWidget(AbstractFieldWidget):
00036         def __init__(self, parent, model, attrs={}):
00037                 AbstractFieldWidget.__init__(self, parent, model, attrs)
00038                 self.setSizePolicy( QSizePolicy.Expanding, QSizePolicy.Expanding )
00039                 self.uiText = QTextEdit( self )
00040                 self.uiText.setSizePolicy( QSizePolicy.Expanding, QSizePolicy.Expanding )
00041                 self.uiText.setTabChangesFocus( True )
00042                 self.installPopupMenu( self.uiText )
00043                 layout = QHBoxLayout( self )
00044                 layout.setContentsMargins( 0, 0, 0, 0 )
00045                 layout.addWidget( self.uiText )
00046                 if attrs.get('translate', False):
00047                         pushTranslate = QToolButton( self )
00048                         pushTranslate.setIcon( QIcon( ':/images/locale.png' ) )
00049                         layout.addWidget( pushTranslate )
00050                         self.connect( pushTranslate, SIGNAL('clicked()'), self.translate )
00051 
00052         def translate(self):
00053                 if not self.record.id:
00054                         QMessageBox.information( self, _('Translation dialog'), _('You must save the resource before adding translations'))
00055                         return
00056                 dialog = TranslationDialog( self.record.id, self.record.group.resource, self.attrs['name'], unicode(self.uiText.document().toPlainText()), TranslationDialog.TextEdit, self )
00057                 if dialog.exec_() == QDialog.Accepted:
00058                         self.uiText.setText( dialog.result )
00059 
00060         def setReadOnly(self, value):
00061                 self.uiText.setReadOnly( value )
00062 
00063         def colorWidget(self):
00064                 return self.uiText
00065 
00066         def store(self):
00067                 self.record.setValue(self.name, unicode( self.uiText.document().toPlainText() ) or False )
00068 
00069         def clear(self):
00070                 self.uiText.clear()
00071 
00072         def showValue(self):
00073                 value = self.record.value(self.name)
00074                 if not value:
00075                         self.uiText.clear()
00076                 else:
00077                         self.uiText.setText( value )
